    • Method Detail

      • getConnection

        protected final java.sql.Connection getConnection()
                                           throws java.sql.SQLException
        Returns the Connection used by descendants of the AbstractMysqlDAO. Only one connection is returned, even after multiple calls to the getConnection() method.
        Returns:
        The Connection used by descendants of the AbstractMysqlDAO.
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException - When an error occurs while establishing a connection.
